attributes.action: Stop promotion of drugs from celebrity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drugs are a big part of crime in the UK, We would like to see action to stop "stars" from winning awards or being at these events due to their drug use. These "stars" are so called roll-models for young children and this is not acceptable. And that known "star" drug users are dealt with by the police. I request that the prime minister takes action to stop this advertising that drugs are cool and spark a debate within government to stop all drug use.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
